comment: Explains things well, gives plenty of in class examples. HW could be challenging at times, but go to O.H & shell explain. Weekly quizzes that arent difficult at all, just pay attention in class. 3 tests & a final; the tests are more than fair.

I really like Dr. Nink. She's young, but she's the polar opposite of those young moody high school teachers who haven't yet matured. She makes the class relaxed and lighthearted. Her bonus questions on tests are usually "What is your favorite ice cream flavor?" or "What are your Thanksgiving plans?" She let us donate money to charity as bonus pts.

Literally attend her class and study the in-class notes and you're guaranteed an A. She's very helpful, nice, and willing to work with you. Her partial credits are amazing, and really easy bonus points on exams. Short quizzes every week, but again it's over the class notes. Her class is what I look forward going to cause it doesn't feel like stress

she's such an awesome professor! gives extra credit on all of her tests, quizzes every friday but they are extremely short. (2 max) very attentive to questions, easy going, relatable so its very easy talking to her. Super accommodating, very thoughtful, and makes sure we understand the material before moving on with lecture. EASY A.

Mrs. Nink is one of the best professors I've ever had. She is super nice and easy to talk to. It was awesome to watch her overcome adversity regarding a rogue student (who was expelled from KSU) and continue to teach her students. I would definitely recommend Mrs. Nink to all KSU students.

Dr. Nink is one of the best math professors I have ever had. She really cares about her students and wants to make sure everyone confidently knows the material. We had about 8 homework assignments throughout the semester and quizzes on most Fridays. Take notes, pay attention, and remember formulas well and you'll do fine

Dr. Nink is a wonderful lady. She is one of the most approachable professor I know. All of the reviews are accurate. She is straight forward with what she wants students to know and goes over everything very thoroughly. Her bonus are unique from any other professor/teacher I had. Outside of academia, she is such a sweet & caring lady.
She knows how to teach math. She really wants to make sure her students understand what she is saying. She tells you what you should know for her test.
Fantastic Math teacher. Made Calc 2 very easy.

She's a great professor and teaches well. Make sure you understand the concepts and know how to use Excel so you can do the homework, quizzes, and tests. There is a quiz mostly every week. She does a little bit of extra credit on the tests.

Professor Nink is so awesome I wish I could be friends with her outside of class. She is so helpful and soo sweet. Plus, she cancels class a lot. Ask a lot of questions on review days for easier tests. I wish I could take her for more upper level math classes. I respect her a lot, and enjoy her class. Heavy on Excel

Dr. Nink makes this class a breeeeze. She's very in depth with her lectures. The tests are very similar to the problems she works in class. She gives partial credit and has a extra credit question worth 3 pts each test. Every week except test week, there is a quiz and hw set on webassign. She often lets us out early, which is a plus.

Amazing teacher. Weekly homework is usually a couple videos to watch and take notes on, in class she gives a daily quiz on the video notes you took and the quizzes are word for word the examples she used in her videos. In class she goes over a few examples and assigns questions from the textbook. You can leave as soon as you finish the questions.

Awesome! She does a reverse classroom and spends a ton of time doing examples and making everyone doing well. If you do the little homework and follow her examples then the test are really easy. She makes Calculus FUN!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Caring

comment: Professor Nink is a BLAST. She's very kind and is easily accessible both in class and out of. Her lectures are very clear and concise. She also has a YouTube channel with 4-10 minute long videos that cover all the material she teaches. As long as you are trying hard (she can tell) you will be graded justly. An EXCELLENT professor and friend. 10/10!

Dr. Bunk is amazing. She makes calculus easier. She cares about her students. She takes time to explain what she is doing and always asks if anyone needs help or has a question. She gives test reviews before the test that are similar to the test. You have one homework and one quiz due online every week but it's not that difficult.
